original_text: therefore wisdom and knowledge will be given you. And I will also give you wealth, possessions and honor, such as no king who was before you ever had and none after you will have.”
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 네게 지혜와 지식을 주고 부와 재물과 영광도 주리니 네 전의 왕들도 이런 일이 없었거니와 네 후에도 이런 일이 없으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And I will also give you
such as no king who was before you ever had
sentences.korean_translation: 너 이전의 어떤 왕도 가지지 못했던 것들

sentences.original_text: and none after you will have
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너 이후의 누구도 가지지 못할 것들
